name: Let's! Go! Shopping
description:
Let's! Go! Shopping! You've been invited to a pizza party but have literally nothing to wear! Go get some clothes for this party! :-) 

Note: This is a student project and I'm planning on adding more to it! 

Note 2: I work on a Mac so it's harder for me to check how the Windows version performs! If you have issues please let me know!
